summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from July 7, 2020, discussing updates on Ghislaine Maxwell's case. It confirms her transfer to the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn on July 6, 2020, and mentions an upcoming bail hearing.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the FBI email chain; discussed regarding her transfer to a detention center and upcoming bail hearing.

events.title: Maxwell transferred to MDC Brooklyn
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was transferred to the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) in Brooklyn.

events.title: Potential bail hearing
events.description: Maxwell is expected to have a bail hearing, possibly on Friday July 10, 2020, or the following week.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was transferred to the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn on July 6, 2020.
A bail hearing for Maxwell was anticipated around July 10, 2020, but could be moved to the following week.
The FBI's Crimes Against Children and Human Trafficking Unit (CACHTU) was actively seeking updates on the case.
The email chain indicates internal FBI coordination regarding Maxwell's custody status and legal proceedings.
